findings.title: Similar LP Token Address can be added more than once
findings.description: The add() function at Line 147 allows storing a similar LP Token Address more than once, leading to an unexpected scenario where different pools will have a similar LP token address.

findings.title: safeRewardTokenTransfer function does not execute adequately if Reward Token
findings.description: The safeRewardTokenTransfer function doesn't store information about the remaining reward tokens owed to the user when the MasterChef contract has less reward token balance than the amount to be transferred, leading to an unexpected scenario where users receive less reward tokens than expected.

findings.title: Multiplication is being performed on the result of Division
findings.description: Performing multiplication after division without proper method can cause precision loss.

findings.title: updatePool & massUpdatePools functions have public visibility instead of internal
findings.description: The updatePool and massUpdatePools functions have been assigned a public visibility instead of internal, making them accessible to everyone. It would have been more effective and secure to mark these functions as internal.
